model_output:
In this comment, the person is speaking positively of Rutgers University and negatively against out-of-state universities, noting the additional cost involved in going out-of-state. The person questions why people would be willing to spend more to have their children study out of state when they could have them studying at a "commuter school" such as Rutgers University (Option A). The mention of "out-of-state" implies they might be believing Virginia Tech (Option B) to be a less economical solution. The person clearly seems to have financial considerations primarily and hence favor local universities more. Given this analysis, the person has inferred a preference for Rutgers University over Virginia Tech.

%%% 
A is preferred over B
